posts.title: Hello world
posts.body:
So I decided to completely redo my website again. This time, it comes with a kind of posting system so I can kind of write blog posts through a JSON file known as blog.json. Anyways, I think it's kinda cool and if you want to check out how I write posts, just click here.

Some introductions, my name is Devin Mui. I'm a high school sophomore studying at Dublin High School. I really like writing code. Especially on the back end with Ruby on Rails. I'm starting to get more into open source stuff I guess. I've been to a bunch of hackathons. Red Bull helped me make this site.

Currently, I want to make a little tool in Node or Python so that when I press a button on the blog.html page, it'll grab the JSON generated, append that to the current JSON, and commit changes to add a new blog post. I don't know. It sounds neat.

This page will also serve some of my friends who want to learn how to program. Sure these posts won't really help that much, but yeah. 

let cat = "fluffy"

Well, that's the end of my first post I guess.

Post written by Devin Mui
